newsitem.title: UK: UK shares end higher but fail to match strong Dow.
newsitem.headline: UK shares end higher but fail to match strong Dow.

text.p: British shares struggled higher in a sluggish day's trade on Monday but ended well short of last week's highs as another strong performance on Wall Street failed to shake off London's post-holiday torpor.
Dealers said many investors seemed content to sit on the sidelines and watch, unnerved by fears of higher UK and U.S. interest rates and the risk of further Wall Street volatility.
The FTSE 100 index of blue-chip stocks ended just short of the day's best levels, up 17 points at 4,106.5. The Dow was up 52 points as London closed, building on Friday's 100-point surge.
